meanings.sent1: The musician tapped the tympano rhythmically.

meanings.sent3: The tympano rolled off the stage and into the audience!

meanings.definition: A part of the middle ear.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the tympano carefully.
meanings.sent2: The tympano helps transmit sound vibrations.
meanings.sent3: The tiny tympano seemed to wiggle when the patient laughed.
meanings.sent4: Her hearing was as delicate as a tympano in a quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The tympano vibrated in response to the loud noise.
